Articles.Content: I find necessity for leaving flight and then going to tracking station to simply recover vessel from (e.g., runway) frustrating. I think there should be 'recover' under esc/pause/whateverthenameis menu.
Exactly what I was thinking about 5 minutes ago. It's frustrating to go to the space center, tracking station, recover vessel... Especially with the 5 seconds of darkness every transition takes.
I've wanted this since they added recover, seconded
